recommendations.title: Add keyboard support to custom interactive elements
recommendations.description: 522 interactive elements may need keyboard support
recommendations.action: Add onKeyDown handlers for Enter/Space key activation

recommendations.title: Implement accessibility for ReactFlow and D3 components
recommendations.description: Complex visualizations require custom keyboard navigation
recommendations.action: Add ARIA labels, keyboard shortcuts, and focus management

recommendations.title: Enhance menu and dropdown keyboard navigation
recommendations.description: Menu components need arrow key navigation support
recommendations.action: Implement arrow key navigation for menu items

recommendations.title: Optimize form keyboard navigation
recommendations.description: Complex forms may benefit from enhanced keyboard shortcuts
recommendations.action: Add keyboard shortcuts for common form actions

recommendations.title: Implement application-wide keyboard shortcuts
recommendations.description: Power users would benefit from global keyboard shortcuts
recommendations.action: Add shortcuts for navigation, search, and common actions
